channel.title: How to make optimized text on interface !?!
channel.description:
How would I go about making an optimized text on an interface in a RSPS??. I want it to be just like the 'report abuse panel in RS, I want it to have the same function properties as that, but my own 'text' obviously. Could somebody please explain how this could be done most efficiently an proper way?
I made a control panel interface with a sidebar and its all good, an I've added a staff panel with a ban option and kick option and I want to be able to write my 'own' text an hit a 'ban' button, etc. And it will ban the name that is written...
THANKS!

item.title: How to make optimized text on interface !?!
item.dc:creator: @keizie keizie
item.description:
@keizie wrote:

How would I go about making an optimized text on an interface in a RSPS??. I want it to be just like the 'report abuse panel in RS, I want it to have the same function properties as that, but my own ‘text’ obviously. Could somebody please explain how this could be done most efficiently an proper way?

an I’ve added a staff panel with a ban option and kick option and I want to be able to write my ‘own’ text an hit a ‘ban’ button, etc.
